TopicTitle: Question about editing UT in the persisten.sfs

Articles.Content:
Hi there,

Does anyone know what the UT value in persistent.sfs value equates to in game time. For instance if I wanted to change the game time to say year 1 day 233, what value would that equate to in the persistent.sfs on the UT line. (day 233 is just as an example) I'm trying to play around and see what different launch windows look like in sandbox mode.

Cheers, thanks
UT is total time from game start (year 1, day 1) in seconds. To change to day 233 you have to add 232 days, 232*6*3600 = 5011200 seconds (assuming time setting is kerbin time with 6 hour days).
Thanks, I didn't see that a kerbin day was 6 hours. That skewed my math as I did it based on a 24hr day.
